thread.title: BRIEF-Wynn Resorts Appoints Three New Independent Directors

title: BRIEF-Wynn Resorts Appoints Three New Independent Directors
text:
April 18 (Reuters) - Wynn Resorts Ltd:
* WYNN RESORTS APPOINTS THREE NEW INDEPENDENT DIRECTORS * WYNN RESORTS LTD - HAS EXPANDED ITS BOARD TO 11 MEMBERS
* WYNN RESORTS LTD - APPOINTMENT OF BETSY ATKINS, DEE DEE MYERS AND WENDY WEBB AS INDEPENDENT DIRECTORS, EFFECTIVE IMMEDIATELY
* WYNN RESORTS LTD - WYNN RESORTS BOARD NOW COMPRISES 36% WOMEN
* WYNN RESORTS LTD - CO IS SETTLING 6 YEARS OF LITIGATION WITH UNIVERSAL ENTERTAINMENT FOR $2.4 BILLION, AN EFFECTIVE REDEMPTION PRICE OF $78 PER SHARE
* WYNN RESORTS LTD - LAUNCH OF NEW EMPLOYEE BENEFITS, SUCH AS PAID PARENTAL LEAVE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
